data: Update Panel displays a change/update log
Displays current version and new version if available
Disabling the plugin will now revert icons to text
Clears pre-loading queue if still up when toggling HD Icons
Fixed a bug where icons are left in text form for edited messages
Use 32x32 Icons or 400x400 Icons by toggling the HD Icons setting
Size of icons can be changed individually or all together (Limited to 12px - 40px as any smaller or larger is uselessly annoying)
